And<S>2532</S> the third<S>5154</S> day<S>2250</S> there was<S>1096</S> a marriage<S>1062</S> in<S>1722</S> Cana<S>2580</S> of Galilee<S>1056</S>; and<S>2532</S> the mother<S>3384</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> was<S>2258</S> there<S>1563</S>:
And<S>1161</S> both<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> was called<S>2564</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, to<S>1519</S> the marriage<S>1062</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when they wanted<S>5302</S> wine<S>3631</S>, the mother<S>3384</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, They have<S>2192</S> no<S>3756</S> wine<S>3631</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto her<S>846</S>, Woman<S>1135</S>, what<S>5101</S> have I<S>1698</S> to do with<S>2532</S> thee<S>4671</S>? mine<S>3450</S> hour<S>5610</S> is<S>2240</S> not yet<S>3768</S> come<S>2240</S>.
His<S>846</S> mother<S>3384</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto the servants<S>1249</S>, Whatsoever<S>3748</S> <S>302</S> he saith<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, do<S>4160</S> it.
And<S>1161</S> there were<S>2258</S> set<S>2749</S> there<S>1563</S> six<S>1803</S> waterpots<S>5201</S> of stone<S>3035</S>, after<S>2596</S> the manner of the purifying<S>2512</S> of the Jews<S>2453</S>, containing<S>5562</S> two<S>1417</S> or<S>2228</S> three<S>5140</S> firkins<S>3355</S> apiece<S>303</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Fill<S>1072</S> the waterpots<S>5201</S> with water<S>5204</S>. And<S>2532</S> they filled<S>1072</S> them<S>846</S> up<S>1072</S> to<S>2193</S> the brim<S>507</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Draw out<S>501</S> now<S>3568</S>, and<S>2532</S> bear<S>5342</S> unto the governor of the feast<S>755</S>. And<S>2532</S> they bare<S>5342</S> it.
<S>1161</S> When<S>5613</S> the ruler of the feast<S>755</S> had tasted<S>1089</S> the water<S>5204</S> that was made<S>1096</S> wine<S>3631</S>, and<S>2532</S> knew<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> whence<S>4159</S> it was<S>2076</S>: (but<S>1161</S> the servants<S>1249</S> which<S>3588</S> drew<S>501</S> the water<S>5204</S> knew<S>1492</S>;) the governor of the feast<S>755</S> called<S>5455</S> the bridegroom<S>3566</S>,
And<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Every<S>3956</S> man<S>444</S> at the beginning<S>4412</S> doth set forth<S>5087</S> good<S>2570</S> wine<S>3631</S>; and<S>2532</S> when<S>3752</S> men have well drunk<S>3184</S>, then<S>5119</S> that which is worse<S>1640</S>: but thou<S>4771</S> hast kept<S>5083</S> the good<S>2570</S> wine<S>3631</S> until<S>2193</S> now<S>737</S>.
This<S>5026</S> beginning<S>746</S> of miracles<S>4592</S> did<S>4160</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> in<S>1722</S> Cana<S>2580</S> of Galilee<S>1056</S>, and<S>2532</S> manifested forth<S>5319</S> his<S>846</S> glory<S>1391</S>; and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> believed<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S>.
After<S>3326</S> this<S>5124</S> he went down<S>2597</S> to<S>1519</S> Capernaum<S>2584</S>, he<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> mother<S>3384</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> brethren<S>80</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>: and<S>2532</S> they continued<S>3306</S> there<S>1563</S> not<S>3756</S> many<S>4183</S> days<S>2250</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the Jews'<S>2453</S> passover<S>3957</S> was<S>2258</S> at hand<S>1451</S>, and<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> went up<S>305</S> to<S>1519</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S>,
And<S>2532</S> found<S>2147</S> in<S>1722</S> the temple<S>2411</S> those that sold<S>4453</S> oxen<S>1016</S> and<S>2532</S> sheep<S>4263</S> and<S>2532</S> doves<S>4058</S>, and<S>2532</S> the changers of money<S>2773</S> sitting<S>2521</S>:
And<S>2532</S> when he had made<S>4160</S> a scourge<S>5416</S> of<S>1537</S> small cords<S>4979</S>, he drove<S>1544</S> them all<S>3956</S> out of<S>1537</S> the temple<S>2411</S>, and<S>5037</S> the sheep<S>4263</S>, and<S>2532</S> the oxen<S>1016</S>; and<S>2532</S> poured out<S>1632</S> the changers'<S>2855</S> money<S>2772</S>, and<S>2532</S> overthrew<S>390</S> the tables<S>5132</S>;
And<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them that sold<S>4453</S> doves<S>4058</S>, Take<S>142</S> these things<S>5023</S> hence<S>1782</S>; make<S>4160</S> not<S>3361</S> my<S>3450</S> Father's<S>3962</S> house<S>3624</S> an house<S>3624</S> of merchandise<S>1712</S>.
And<S>1161</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> remembered<S>3415</S> that<S>3754</S> it was<S>2076</S> written<S>1125</S>, The zeal<S>2205</S> of thine<S>4675</S> house<S>3624</S> hath eaten<S>2719</S> me<S>3165</S> up<S>2719</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> answered<S>611</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, What<S>5101</S> sign<S>4592</S> shewest thou<S>1166</S> unto us<S>2254</S>, seeing that<S>3754</S> thou doest<S>4160</S> these things<S>5023</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Destroy<S>3089</S> this<S>5126</S> temple<S>3485</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> three<S>5140</S> days<S>2250</S> I will raise<S>1453</S> it<S>846</S> up<S>1453</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> the Jews<S>2453</S>, Forty<S>5062</S> and<S>2532</S> six<S>1803</S> years<S>2094</S> was<S>3618</S> this<S>3778</S> temple<S>3485</S> in building<S>3618</S>, and<S>2532</S> wilt<S>1453</S> thou<S>4771</S> rear<S>1453</S> it<S>846</S> up<S>1453</S> in<S>1722</S> three<S>5140</S> days<S>2250</S>?
But<S>1161</S> he<S>1565</S> spake<S>3004</S> of<S>4012</S> the temple<S>3485</S> of his<S>846</S> body<S>4983</S>.
When<S>3753</S> therefore<S>3767</S> he was risen<S>1453</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S>, his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> remembered<S>3415</S> that<S>3754</S> he had said<S>3004</S> this<S>5124</S> unto them<S>846</S>; and<S>2532</S> they believed<S>4100</S> the scripture<S>1124</S>, and<S>2532</S> the word<S>3056</S> which<S>3739</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> had said<S>2036</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> when<S>5613</S> he was<S>2258</S> in<S>1722</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S> at<S>1722</S> the passover<S>3957</S>, in<S>1722</S> the feast<S>1859</S> day, many<S>4183</S> believed<S>4100</S> in<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S>, when they saw<S>2334</S> the miracles<S>846</S> <S>4592</S> which<S>3739</S> he did<S>4160</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> <S>846</S> did<S>4100</S> not<S>3756</S> commit<S>4100</S> himself<S>1438</S> unto them<S>846</S>, because<S>1223</S> he<S>846</S> knew<S>1097</S> all<S>3956</S> men,
And<S>2532</S> <S>3754</S> needed<S>5532</S> <S>2192</S> not<S>3756</S> that<S>2443</S> any<S>5100</S> should testify<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> man<S>444</S>: for<S>1063</S> he<S>846</S> knew<S>1097</S> what<S>5101</S> was<S>2258</S> in<S>1722</S> man<S>444</S>.
